transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hello bhaiya, main Tripti baat kar rahi hun IndiaMART se.

Customer: Ji boliye na Tripti ji. Good morning.

Executive: Ji mam aap ha ji sir aapne ticket raise kiya tha.

Customer: Ji ticket raise nahi kiya maine direct call ya fir mere hisab se.

Executive: Ha call kiya tha aapne. Ha to sir kya problem hai mujhe batayega.

Customer: Main ye bol raha tha ki abhi kuch film use nahi ho raha hai jyada IndiaMART ka aur kam bhi nahi ho raha hai to thoda sa rok sakte hai apan isko kuch time ke liye.

Executive: Sir ye to stop wala to nahi process hai hamare pass sir jo stop nahi ho sakti aapki services agar par aap busy hai to aap kisi aur ko end over kar do agar aap nahi use kar sakte ho to.

Customer: Nahi waisa nahi hai thoda system change karne ka chal raha hai na bahut din se.

Executive: [inaudible] matlab.

Customer: Isliye thoda focus nahi ho raha hai.

Executive: [inaudible]

Customer: Ha matlab ki wohi material abhi jo pehle hum avail karte the woh buyer se karte the ab hum abhi khud hi generate kar rahe the.

Executive: [inaudible]

Customer: To uske liye thoda sa time hai aur already jo existing hai client unke sath hi filhal to deal chal rahi hai naye kuch hum kar nahi rahe hai kam aur ya ispe kya hai na ki us regarding thoda sa order bhi aaye to bhi fulfillment nahi ho raha hai.

Executive: Sir matlab to.

Customer: To waise to inquiry kam hi hai jyadatar.

Executive: Sir ye kam hai na ha main bata rahi hu kyuki aap use bhi to nahi kar rahe na.

Customer: Kya kya?

Executive: Aap use nahi kar rahe na IndiaMART to inquiry to kam aayengi sir.

Customer: Ha lekin jab kar rahe the tabhi bhi kam aa rahi thi aur recently mein bhi to waise kaise rehta hai ki jahan se jyada business mil raha hai jyadatar staff wagera wohi pe karta hai aur pehle main karta tha isliye thoda sa hota tha kam wagera abhi filhal mera bhi jyada dhyan nahi hai iske upar dusre do project ke upar hai to bas wohi hai soch raha tha ki agar aapka kuch samay ke liye pause ho jata to achi baat thi.

Executive: Nahi sir pause wala to nahi hoga policy nahi hai hamari.

Customer: Hmm hmm hmm to fir option hi nahi hai apne pass. Lagbhag teen mahine to kuch fayda hi nahi hoga iska. Waise iski membership ki.

Executive: [inaudible]

Customer: Ha teen mahine tak mere hisab se kuch nahi.

Executive: [inaudible]

Customer: Ha January do saal ke liye tha na mere hisab se.

Executive: Ha January ke aas pass hi liya tha na aapne.

Customer: 2026 hai ya 2027?

Executive: Sir annual aapka.

Customer: Sorry?

Executive: Sir annual aapka 27 tak hai.

Customer: Abhi to aapke pass time hai.

Executive: Kitna time hai? 2026 tak hai na 2027 tak hai na theek hai fir.

Executive: December 2027.

Customer: Achha okay. Abhi filhal to option nahi hai.

Executive: Sir abhi agar teen mahine use nahi karoge.

Customer: Koi baat nahi uske baad.

Executive: Ha do teen mahine thoda dikat hai. Ji kya bol rahe the?

Executive: Ha ye batayega sir ki reason kya hai use na karne ka aapke pass bhi time nahi hai stock hi nahi hai aapke pass abhi.

Customer: Stock ha stock bahut filhal to market kharab hai filhal jo bhi pehle karte the uske hisab se abhi nahi hai jyada.

Executive: Achha. Ha to sir ye batayega ki aapne bola bhi ki mam pehle bhi inquiry ya call nahi aata jab main use kar raha tha to tab koi issue aa raha tha kya kisi se baat nahi ki aapki jo aapke account manager hai.

Customer: Ji aapke ye karte the phone wagera wohi catalog update karna fir lead consume karne ke liye bolna fir profile fix check karna bas wohi same cheeze same karte the.

Executive: Sir issue nahi batate the ki buyer lead nahi consume kar raha hu to sahi se relevant nahi aa rahe candidate matlab buyer.

Customer: Ha woh to woh to batate hi the lekin jab ha jab hum buyer lead istemal karte bhi the us time pe jyada kuch hota nahi tha iska benefit theek hai to chal raha tha waise hi lekin chalo koi nahi wo kya hota hai ki 10 customer bhi mil jaaye.

Executive: [inaudible]

Customer: Hmm to bhi ha bas sir mahine mein do teen bhi mil jaaye achche khase theek hai ek saal ke liye agar ek bhi aise sa mil jaaye to hamara kam banta hai.

Executive: Nahi main agar aap thoda bahut time do sir to main aapko suggest karungi ek do cheeze bas din ke buyer lead consume karo daily basis pe jo aa rahi hai agar aapke pass stock hai main to yahi kahungi theek hai baki meri aapki last kis baat hui thi wo to mujhe nahi pata kis bare mein hui thi unhone filter bataye the aapko pata nahi mujhe kyuki aapne buyer lead to ek 90 din bhi koi consume hi nahi kari aapne buyer lead main sir yahan par buyer lead ka hi hai hai na buyer lead aapki consume nahi kari main aapka ye portal open kiya hua hai maine aapka catalog.

Customer: Hmm hmm.

Executive: Inquiry sir why aisa hota hai agar aap buyer lead consume karte rehte ho na apni daily basis wali jitni bhi aati hai aapke pass theek hai.

Customer: Hmm hmm.

Executive: To sir usse kya hota hai ki aapke pass call inquiry ki chances bahut jyada matlab wohi baat ho gayi na ki agar aap dukan pe baithe ho to grahak aayenge otherwise nahi aayenge.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: To ye yahan pe simple sa concept hai ki agar aap active hi nahi ho buyer leads pe to call inquiry bhi na hamari fir less ho jati hai sir.

Customer: Ha woh to aapka bhi system hi waisa to kya kar sakte hai. Nahi fir theek hai filhal to abhi kuch samay tak mujhe nahi possible hai ye karne ke liye agar in case iske liye koi banda hire kar lag kar sakta hu aage chal kar to main baat karne ke liye.

Executive: Ha system hai. Ha aise kar lo sir dekho aapki services bhi ha ha dekho sir aapki services bhi abhi ek saal ki hai main to yahi kahungi theek hai aap ek bande ko de do usko training agar is IndiaMART portal ki training provide karni hogi wo bhi hamara hum kara denge theek hai aap usse befikar raho aap kar karke dekh lo sir kisi aur ko hand over kar do aap fir dekhna aayenge inquiry bhi aayengi calls bhi aayengi.

Customer: Ha chalega na koi problem nahi.

Executive: Theek hai aap koi banda dhundo aur aapke pass number to hai hi mera aap save kar lena Tripti ke naam se theek hai koi bhi problem ho jab aap aap banda hire kar loge apne liye iske liye to aap mujhe call kar lena main training wagera dilwani hai.

Customer: Theek hai.

Executive: Sir main yahi kahungi aapke product achche hai requirement bhi aati hai aap socho aap active nahi the bahut logo ke portal pe kya hota hai ki agar wo active bhi nahi hai to unke pass call inquiry zero padhi rehti hai aapke pass last month isme dikha raha hai ki aapke pass 30 inquiry aayi hai.

Customer: Hmm hmm.

Executive: 15 zero inquiry matlab buyer se hai na to main yahi kahungi kyuki sir ab product ki demand jyada rehti hai to isliye maine aapko force kiya is cheez ke liye ki aap kisi bande ko hire karo is cheez ke liye aapko bhi benefit dikh jayega main aapko daily basis pe unhe call karungi unko guide karungi to buyer lead bhi consume hongi buyer bhi connect honge aur conversion bhi hoga sir business bhi milega aap paisa invest karte ho main to ye kehti hu ki aap paisa invest karte ho to zarur business mile aapko IndiaMART.

Customer: Okay done chalega.

Executive: Theek hai okay aap banda hire karo fir aap mujhe call karna theek hai.

Customer: Okay chalega.

Executive: Okay sir okay sir aur koi issue sir?

Customer: Nahi koi nahi theek hai.

Executive: Okay sir thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to pause IndiaMART subscription.

- Customer is not getting enough business.

- Customer is not able to focus on IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Explained that pausing is not possible.

- Suggested handing over account to someone else.

- Suggested hiring someone for IndiaMART account.

- Offered training for hired person.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will hire someone and call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, buyleads, training, business
